name: BeautifulPrincessDisorder
description: What is the project about? It's about being beautiful as a princess and thinking the world revolves you at all times. It's a disorder just like the markets. Just like humanity. Made with love to all humans, even the ugly ones. What makes your project unique? It's the first and only disorder meta ever created. Many will come. Copycats. But until now we are unique. We are loved. We are all beautiful princesses and princes with a beautiful princess disorder. We love princesses. Who doesn't? History of your project. Born from the infinite creative vortex of iQ. With BPD. The entire team is made of a princess, and her angel dragon. Martin Saints is the angel dragon. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We will gather all humans with BPD (beautiful princess disorder) and spread our disorder to the ones left out. What can your token be used for? As a store of value. As a means for trades. As a token of appreciation. To buy a ring for the princess or crystal shoes, high heels of course. To finance a eternal treatment for an incurable disorder, the only disorder everyone loves and would like to keep. Feel free to check our contract : https://etherscan.io/token/0xC81b0d02393a956234E24564805a896f14ad1250#code#L1
